name: clmneg1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpisyl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1), wss(cz, c1), wcel(cneg(nat1), cz))
stmt.pretty: mpisyl(c0 ∈ CMod, -u(1)∈ c1, ℤ ⊆ c1, -u(1)∈ ℤ)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wss(cz, c1))
-| wcel(cneg(nat1), cz)
-| wi(wss(cz, c1), wi(wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wss(cz, c1))
-| wcel(cneg(nat1), cz)
-| wi(wss(cz, c1), wi(wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wss(cz, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CMod → ℤ ⊆ c1)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1))
-| wcel(cneg(nat1), cz)
-| wi(wss(cz, c1), wi(wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1))
-| wi(wss(cz, c1), wi(wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(cz, c1), wi(wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CMod → -u(1)∈ c1)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)

comment: Minus one is in the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by AV, 28-Sep-2021.)
